thread.section_title: KISA Phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA Phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Anna MacDonald
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Anna MacDonald

author: Anna MacDonald
title: Anna MacDonald
text:
I called once when my elderly mother couldn't get the phone to work. The support I received was patient, kind, caring and informative.
The "problem" was only that my mum didn't fully understand the need to put the phone on charge!
The phone itself is great and mum thinks she is just so "modern".
